file.name: Open_API.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: SmartEnergy-API
  description: The API for the SmartEnergy IOT project
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/Smart628/SmartEnergy/1.0.0
  description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
- url: http://127.0.0.1:5000/
  description: Localhost
paths:
  /devices:
    get:
      tags:
      - Devices
      description: returns all devices registered in database
      operationId: getDevices
      responses:
        "200":
          description: All devices from database
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Devices'
  /device:
    get:
      tags:
      - Device
      description: returns a specific device
      operationId: getDevice
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: Device id
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Device details
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
    put:
      tags:
      - Device
      description: Update device
      operationId: updateDevice
      parameters:
      - name: device
        in: body
        description: Device
        required: false
        style: simple
        explode: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Newly updated device
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
    post:
      tags:
      - Device
      description: Add device to database
      operationId: addDevice
      parameters:
      - name: device
        in: body
        description: Device
        required: false
        style: simple
        explode: false
        schema:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Newly added device
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
    delete:
      tags:
      - Device
      description: Delete device from database
      operationId: deleteDevice
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: Device id
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: True or False if the device has been deleted successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
                format: boolean
  /device/data:
    get:
      tags:
      - Device Data
      description: Get device data
      operationId: getDeviceData
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: Device id
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: page
        in: query
        description: Page id
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: per_page
        in: query
        description: Items per page
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Device details
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceDatas'
    post:
      tags:
      - Device Data
      description: Insert device data in database
      operationId: addDeviceData
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: query
        description: Device id
        required: false
        style: simple
        explode: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: time
        in: query
        description: Time and Date
        required: false
        style: simple
        explode: false
        schema:
          type: string
          formate: date
      - name: value
        in: query
        description: Consumption value
        required: false
        style: simple
        explode: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: True or False if the device data has been inserted successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
                format: boolean
  /device/predict_consumption:
    get:
      tags:
      - Device Statistics
      description: returns the predicted consumption for a device in a given timeframe
      operationId: getDeviceConsumptionPrediction
      parameters:
      - name: start_time
        in: query
        description: the start date of the given timeframe
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: end_time
        in: query
        description: the end date of the given timeframe
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: device_id
        in: query
        description: the device id for which the prediction is made
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: The predicted consumption, in kW
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: integer
        "400":
          description: Bad argument
  /device/predict_left_running:
    get:
      tags:
      - Device Statistics
      description: returns if the device is presumed left running without a real need
      operationId: predictIsDeviceLeftRunning
      parameters:
      - name: device_id
        in: query
        description: the device id for which the prediction is made
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A boolean, True or False, if the device is left running or not
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
        "400":
          description: Bad argument
  /device/anomaly_check:
    get:
      tags:
      - Device Statistics
      description: returns True if the consumption profile of a given device in an interval of 6 hours is annormal
      operationId: getAnomalyCheck
      parameters:
      - name: timestamp
        in: query
        description: the start date of the 6 hour period for which the consumption is tested
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: device_id
        in: query
        description: the device id for which the prediction is made
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: True, if the consumption is very different from the predicted consumption, False otherwise
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
        "403":
          description: Invalid parameters
  /user/statistics:
    get:
      tags:
      - User
      description: returns consumption data for all devices for a given month in a year
      operationId: getStatistics
      parameters:
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: the month for which the statistics are wanted
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: the year for which the statistics are wanted
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: a list of consumption data for each device
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceStatistics'
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
  /user/unoptimized_devices:
    get:
      tags:
      - User
      description: returns which devices can be optimized for a better energy consumption
      operationId: getUnoptimizedDevices
      parameters:
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: the month for which the statistics are wanted
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: the year for which the statistics are wanted
        required: false
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: a list of consumption data for each device with energy reduction tips
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnoptimizedDevice'
        "400":
          description: Invalid request
components:
  schemas:
    Devices:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Devices_inner'
    Device:
      type: object
      properties:
        alias:
          type: string
          example: FurnaceHRV [kW] mock device
        description:
          type: string
          example: FurnaceHRV [kW] mock device
        id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        settings:
          type: object
          example: {}
        status:
          type: boolean
          example: true
        uuid:
          type: string
          example: eb45cc37-daff-4df9-a312-2e829e89b3f3
    DeviceDatas:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceDatas_inner'
    DeviceData:
      type: object
      properties:
        device_id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        id:
          type: integer
          example: 1
        time:
          type: string
          example: 2014-01-01 00:00:00.000000
        value:
          type: integer
          example: 0.195337778
    DeviceStatistics:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceStatistics_inner'
    UnoptimizedDevice:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnoptimizedDevice_inner'
    Devices_inner:
      properties:
        allOf:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Device'
    DeviceDatas_inner:
      properties:
        allOf:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceData'
    DeviceStatistics_inner:
      type: object
      properties:
        device name:
          type: string
          example: Dish washer
        total consumption this month (kW):
          type: integer
          example: 12.1321
        average daily consumption (kW):
          type: integer
          example: 0.413
    UnoptimizedDevice_inner:
      type: object
      properties:
        device name:
          type: string
          example: Dish washer
        predicted consumption (kW):
          type: integer
          example: 12.1321
        real consumption (kW):
          type: integer
          example: 20.413
        tip:
          type: string
          example: Reduce the consumption by keeping the old habits

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/device/data": at 1:4393: post: operation "addDeviceData": at 1:5094: parameters: parse parameter "id": at 1:5186: invalid style explode combination "simple", explode:false
